items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript library
items.title: Adam-Elmi/CopyShare: A lightweight JavaScript library

items.content_html: MagillaStream is a portable RTMP server application designed for streamers who want to broadcast to YouTube and Twitch with customizable settings. Despite its powerful capabilities, including a user-friendly GUI and integrated binaries for streamlined setup, MagillaStream remains lightweight in operation and easy to use.
items.title: billboyles/magillastream: MagillaStream is a portable RTMP server application designed for streamers who want to broadcast to YouTube and Twitch with customizable settings. Despite its powerful capabilities, including a user-friendly GUI and integrated binaries for streamlined setup, MagillaStream remains lightweight in operation and easy to use.

items.content_html: A lightweight layer for working with JSON:API data.
items.title: tobyzerner/json-api-models: A lightweight layer for working with JSON:API data.

items.content_html: ThingJS 3D Engine (t3d) is a lightweight, web-first, and extendable 3D rendering library.
items.title: uinosoft/t3d.js: ThingJS 3D Engine (t3d) is a lightweight, web-first, and extendable 3D rendering library.

items.content_html: A lightweight, high-speed database designed for Node.js and Electron.js applications.
items.title: said-faraj/BreezeDB: A lightweight, high-speed database designed for Node.js and Electron.js applications.

items.content_html: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.
items.title: react18-tools/react-webgl-trails: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.

items.content_html: BlazeDB is a blazing fast NoSQL database built for modern applications. It provides a lightweight and easy-to-use data storage solution that is designed to scale with your application.
items.title: Frost-Lord/BlazeDB: BlazeDB is a blazing fast NoSQL database built for modern applications. It provides a lightweight and easy-to-use data storage solution that is designed to scale with your application.

items.content_html: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.
items.title: react18-tools/nextjs-darkmode: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.

items.content_html: This webpack plugin package is a CSS mangler that globally optimizes and shortens identifier names.
items.title: MTtankkeo/css-mangle-webpack-plugin: This webpack plugin package is a CSS mangler that globally optimizes and shortens identifier names.

items.content_html: A lightweight package manager based on Yarn.
items.title: linuxfandudeguy/cnsh: A lightweight package manager based on Yarn.

items.content_html: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.
items.title: react18-tools/react-markdown-autolink: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.

items.content_html: Lightweight and type-safe query builder for DynamoDB and TypeScript
items.title: dynamodb-toolbox/dynamodb-toolbox: Lightweight and type-safe query builder for DynamoDB and TypeScript

items.content_html: A lightweight and minimalistic drawing tool built with vanilla JavaScript, featuring essential sketching functions like pencil, bucket fill, and eraser.
items.title: takatama/mini-draw: A lightweight and minimalistic drawing tool built with vanilla JavaScript, featuring essential sketching functions like pencil, bucket fill, and eraser.

items.content_html: Syncfusion Vue UI component library offer more than 50+ cross-browser, responsive, and lightweight vue UI controls for building modern web applications.
items.title: syncfusion/ej2-vue-ui-components: Syncfusion Vue UI component library offer more than 50+ cross-browser, responsive, and lightweight vue UI controls for building modern web applications.

items.content_html: Syncfusion Angular UI components library offer more than 50+ cross-browser, responsive, and lightweight angular UI controls for building modern web applications.
items.title: syncfusion/ej2-angular-ui-components: Syncfusion Angular UI components library offer more than 50+ cross-browser, responsive, and lightweight angular UI controls for building modern web applications.

items.content_html: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.
items.title: JaCraig/Woodchuck: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.

items.content_html: Syncfusion React UI components library offer more than 50+ cross-browser, responsive, and lightweight react UI controls for building modern web applications.
items.title: syncfusion/ej2-react-ui-components: Syncfusion React UI components library offer more than 50+ cross-browser, responsive, and lightweight react UI controls for building modern web applications.

items.content_html: Syncfusion JavaScript UI controls library offer more than 50+ cross-browser, responsive, and lightweight HTML5 UI controls for building modern web applications.
items.title: syncfusion/ej2-javascript-ui-controls: Syncfusion JavaScript UI controls library offer more than 50+ cross-browser, responsive, and lightweight HTML5 UI controls for building modern web applications.

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript library for converting markup documents into an annotated text format consumable by LanguageTool.
items.title: prosegrinder/annotatedtext: A lightweight JavaScript library for converting markup documents into an annotated text format consumable by LanguageTool.

items.content_html: Lillihub is a simple, lightweight micro.blog web client with a light/dark mode and responsive design. It is built using Deno, HTML, CSS, and a sprinkle of vanilla JavaScript. It is delightfully usable without JavaScript being enabled.
items.title: heyloura/lillihub-client: Lillihub is a simple, lightweight micro.blog web client with a light/dark mode and responsive design. It is built using Deno, HTML, CSS, and a sprinkle of vanilla JavaScript. It is delightfully usable without JavaScript being enabled.
